articles.article:
To login you need to enter the correct username and password.
These are the same as what you use to login on the winnou.net website and should already be created for you or registered by you on the *.winnou.net website where * is a unique prefix for your college.

To see the list of supported colleges and URL of the website see the FAQ on "Supported Colleges"

In case you login incorrectly multiple times, you might see a captcha prompt, entry the captcha text correctly to login successfully.

In case you are facing any problem or questions, contact us by creating a ticket.

There are a limited number of colleges supported by College Academics. We strive to continuously add support for more colleges.

Currently supported colleges and their online website are:

article.subject: Where can I change my Privacy settings?

articles.article: You can find privacy related settings under the privacy section in the Settings menu in the drawer by sliding from the left or by clicking on the hamburger menu icon.

article.subject: How do I change my language settings

articles.article:
To change the language of the app, make sure you have the desired language set for the android system in the system settings.
The apps language will change automatically based on your system preferred language.

article.subject: How do I reset my password

articles.article:
If you have forgotten your password,
please visit the website of your college providing the attendance info and click the
'Forgot Password' link to reset your password.
You will receive a mail on your registered email-id with a confirmation code
which you will need at the time of resetting your password.
